column5: Was fishing in about 250 feet of water off of the ford plant on Saturday and the daughter lands this atlantic. First one in the boat this year. The fight was INSANE!!!!! Hope these plantings work cuz there a great fish!  Enjoy
Great catch by your daughter.They are fighters.
they are wicked fighters complete with drag smoking runs and 3-4 ft leaps from the water.  awesome on light tackle!
Sweet!!!! I'd love to catch one myself  Beauty fish!!
Love the atlantics. Good arms on your daughter too!
Cheers on the Atlantic, I think I will pour a fine glass of Banrock Station wine to celebrate
I haven't caught one on the Great Lakes yet but the fight is awesome. Congrats to your daughter.
How did it taste? I want to eat one....I gotta catch one first though!!  S.
That is a nice catch way to go. As for eating t I don't think that is big enough to keep.
